paragraphs.text:
%md ### Much Inspiration Drawn from the Following:
* https://github.com/twitter/algebird/wiki/
* https://github.com/twitter/algebird/wiki/Learning-Algebird-Monoids-with-REPL
* http://donlehmanjr.com/Science/03%20Decay%20Ave/032.htm
* https://github.com/phatak-dev/java-sizeof

paragraphs.title: Normal Scala/Java Set
paragraphs.text:
import com.madhukaraphatak.sizeof.SizeEstimator

val memorySizeString = SizeEstimator.estimate("abc");

val set = (Set(1) ++ Set(2,3) ++ Set(3,4) ++ Set(5))
val memorySizeSet = SizeEstimator.estimate(set)

result.msg:
import com.madhukaraphatak.sizeof.SizeEstimator
memorySizeString: Long = 48
set: scala.collection.immutable.Set[Int] = Set(5, 1, 2, 3, 4)
memorySizeSet: Long = 312

paragraphs.title: HyperLogLog (Count Distinct)
paragraphs.text:
import com.twitter.algebird.HyperLogLog._

// HyperLogLogAggregator - High Level Convenience
import com.twitter.algebird.HyperLogLogAggregator

val hllAgg = HyperLogLogAggregator.withBits[Int](14)

val hllAggs = hllAgg(List(1)) + hllAgg(List(1,2)) + hllAgg(List(2,3)) + hllAgg(List(3,4)) + hllAgg(List(4,5)) + hllAgg(List(5))
val memorySizeHllAggs = SizeEstimator.estimate(hllAggs)

val hllAggs2 = hllAgg((List(1) ++ List(2,3) ++ List(3,4) ++ List(5)))
val memorySizeHllAggs2 = SizeEstimator.estimate(hllAggs)

val approxSize = hllAggs.approximateSize
val approxSizeMin = approxSize.min
val approxSizeEstimate = approxSize.estimate
val approxSizeMax = approxSize.max
val approxSizeEstimateProbabilityWithinBounds = approxSize.probWithinBounds

val estimatedSize = hllAggs.estimatedSize
val estimatedSizeInt = estimatedSize.toInt

// HyperLogLogMonoid - Low Level
import com.twitter.algebird.HyperLogLogMonoid
val hllMonoid = new HyperLogLogMonoid(14)
val lists = (List(1) ++ List(2,3) ++ List(3,4) ++ List(5))
val hlls = lists.map(hllMonoid.create(_))
val combinedHllMonoid = hllMonoid.sum(hlls)
val memorySizeCombinedHllMonoid = SizeEstimator.estimate(combinedHllMonoid)
val approxSizeEstimateHllMonoid = hllMonoid.sizeOf(combinedHllMonoid)

result.msg:

paragraphs.title: CountMin Sketch (Frequency, Count, Heavy Hitter)
paragraphs.text:
import com.twitter.algebird.CMS
import com.twitter.algebird.CMSAggregator
import com.twitter.algebird.CMSHasherImplicits._

val cmsMonoid = CMS.monoid[Int](0.001, 1E-10, 1) 

val cmsAgg = CMSAggregator(cmsMonoid)
val lists = (List(1) ++ List(2,3) ++ List(3,4) ++ List(5))
val cmsAggs = cmsAgg(lists)

val memorySizeCombinedCmsAggs = SizeEstimator.estimate(cmsAggs)

val totalCount = cmsAggs.totalCount
val frequency1 = cmsAggs.frequency(1).estimate
val frequency1 = cmsAggs.frequency(3).estimate
